description: Antidiagonally reading the array, formed via: first, writing the primes in the first row (row_1), and forming all successive rows' elements using the previous rows' elements as: row_2(j) = row_1(j)*row_1(j+1) - row_1(j) - row_1(j+1), and so on. The first 'column' of the array, 2 1 -1 -1 -1 -1 -1 -1 ... is converted to its absolute value.
